title: "Duck on Tub ( or Save For A Rainy Day)" still bank
marks:
Inscription

 
on bottom, in a shiny substance:
description: white duck wearing a black top hat and carrying a red and black umbrella standing on a red base; duck has a yellow beak and feet; the metal bank is in 2 parts held together with a screw at the side; \"Save for a Rainy Day\" in relief on one side of base
